title: Attempting to recconect
body:
Recently when i've been playing league the attempting to recconect thing comes up but I can still see everyone moving around normally but I can't move or do anything myself, it happens every 1-2 minutes while playing , anyone know what it could be? I was looking around and someone said it could be a firewall or something or it could be the recent patch but it only started yesterday so I don't think thats the case. Anyone got any idea's how I can fix this issue? 

Thank you!

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like it could be related to high [Packet Loss](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq6) and/or [Packet Buffering](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq7), please attempt the fixes linked under Packet Buffering.

Let me know if the information on either of those links helps.

I tested some other games out and it's on my end! I disconnect for 20-30 seconds so it's not just league.  Also I can't use the ICSI Netalyzr since i'm using Chrome, so I can't get the java thing needed to use that. Got anything else that I could use to fix this issue?

It's more than likely on your ISP's side.

Could you please download [WinMTR](http://winmtr.net/download-winmtr/) and run a traceroute to **103.240.227.5** (Please allow this to run for a decent period of time (10-20 minutes at least), export your results as a text file or take a screenshot and post them here.

Is that good enough? I dunno where the attach files button is.
You should contact your ISP and inquire about the issue as it is probably on their end, however those WinMTR results are rather useless as none of the hops could be resolved.
Alright i'll get on to it, thank you for the help!
